data.text: @BarbFrericks @PeterHotez @UN_PGA @UN What have you learned? Experimental injections are ineffective after 180 days and don’t prevent infection or transmission & have same viral load as those not taking the shots? Did you learn that from the good dr?

@PeterHotez @UN_PGA @UN Obviously,  @GovRonDeSantis and the @flhealthlee @HealthyFla aren't  listening to you. They aren't interested in facts or science. 

Never believe or vote for the @gop at any level.
@PeterHotez @UN_PGA @UN Thank you for all you’ve done to educate the public through this pandemic, and all that your lab and research is doing Dr. Hotez. 👏
@PeterHotez @UN_PGA @UN Peter should get an award for his role in motivating people to become anti-Covid vaccines. 🏆

@PeterHotez @UN_PGA @UN “Global anti-vaccine aggression’ is one hell of a name for ‘Covid does not present a risk to me so I don’t see the need to take an experimental vaccine that did not undergo the same long term testing all other approved vaccines do’.
